sentences.sentence: The results show that there are protozoa(main infusorian)and mini-metazoa(rotifer and daphnia)communities in PFU.
sentences.translation: 结果表明：PFU中的原生动物主要是纤毛虫，微型后生动物主要是轮虫和水蚤。

sentences.sentence: The tubificidae, one type of metazoa was chosen to control activated sludge bulking which was caused by filamentous bacteria.
sentences.translation: 研究了一种后生动物—颤蚓对丝状细菌引起的活性污泥膨胀的控制效果。

sentences.sentence: Owing to its distinct attribute property and old age, this discovery may have epoch—making significance on the study of the evolution of early Metazoa.
sentences.translation: 对于地球后生动物早期演化的研究具有划时代的意义。
